channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiSOAR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiSOAR

item.title: CVE-2022-38379|2024-10-22T20:51:29.381Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: Improper neutralization of input during web page generation [CWE-79] in FortiSOAR 7.0.0 through 7.0.3 and 7.2.0 may allow an authenticated attacker to inject HTML tags via input fields of various components within FortiSOAR.

item.title: CVE-2024-45327|2024-09-11T13:35:38.758Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability [CWE-285] in FortiSOAR version 7.4.0 through 7.4.3, 7.3.0 through 7.3.2, 7.2.0 through 7.2.2, 7.0.0 through 7.0.3 change password endpoint may allow an authenticated attacker to perform a brute force attack on users and administrators password via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-26211|2024-08-13T16:00:04.582Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation ('cross-site scripting') in Fortinet FortiSOAR 7.3.0 through 7.3.2 allows an authenticated, remote attacker to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the Communications module.

item.title: CVE-2023-23775|2024-08-02T10:42:26.252Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: Multiple improper neutralization of special elements used in SQL commands ('SQL Injection') vulnerabilities [CWE-89] in FortiSOAR 7.2.0 and before 7.0.3 may allow an authenticated attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via specifically crafted strings parameters.

item.title: CVE-2023-23775|2024-06-11T18:46:10.782Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: Multiple improper neutralization of special elements used in SQL commands ('SQL Injection') vulnerabilities [CWE-89] in FortiSOAR 7.2.0 and before 7.0.3 may allow an authenticated attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via specifically crafted strings parameters.

item.title: CVE-2024-31493|2024-06-04T17:36:40.737Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: An improper removal of sensitive information before storage or transfer vulnerability [CWE-212] in FortiSOAR version 7.3.0, version 7.2.2 and below, version 7.0.3 and below may allow an authenticated low privileged user to read Connector passwords in plain-text via HTTP responses.

item.title: CVE-2024-31493|2024-08-02T01:52:57.311Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: An improper removal of sensitive information before storage or transfer vulnerability [CWE-212] in FortiSOAR version 7.3.0, version 7.2.2 and below, version 7.0.3 and below may allow an authenticated low privileged user to read Connector passwords in plain-text via HTTP responses.

item.title: CVE-2024-45327|2024-09-11T09:53:46.087Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability [CWE-285] in FortiSOAR version 7.4.0 through 7.4.3, 7.3.0 through 7.3.2, 7.2.0 through 7.2.2, 7.0.0 through 7.0.3 change password endpoint may allow an authenticated attacker to perform a brute force attack on users and administrators password via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-45327|2024-09-12T03:55:24.954Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability [CWE-285] in FortiSOAR version 7.4.0 through 7.4.3, 7.3.0 through 7.3.2, 7.2.0 through 7.2.2, 7.0.0 through 7.0.3 change password endpoint may allow an authenticated attacker to perform a brute force attack on users and administrators password via crafted HTTP requests.
